hero.title: Welcome to IEEE Student Organization
hero.subtitle: Empowering the next generation of engineers and innovators through collaboration, learning, and professional development.

aboutPreview.title: About Us
aboutPreview.content: Our IEEE Student Organization is dedicated to fostering innovation, professional development, and community engagement among engineering students. We provide opportunities for networking, skill development, and real-world project experience.

features.title: Professional Development
features.description: Access workshops, seminars, and training sessions to enhance your skills.

features.title: Networking Opportunities
features.description: Connect with industry professionals, alumni, and fellow students.

features.title: Technical Projects
features.description: Participate in hands-on projects and competitions.

features.title: Community Impact
features.description: Make a difference through outreach and community service.
